translations: 确定性，定指；明确；清晰度；梅性

sentences.sentence: The fifth attribute Hill calls “ definiteness of plans “.
sentences.translation: 第五个特称，希尔称之为“计划的明确性”。

sentences.sentence: The definiteness of the man chilled him to the marrow.
sentences.translation: 这人斩钉截铁的口吻使他冷彻骨髓。

sentences.sentence: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
sentences.translation: 确定目标是取得所有成功的起点。
